issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

fields.summary: euca-describe-images doesn't show "name" passed by euca-register

fields.description:
*Assessment*

Using EC2 API tools (1.6.10.1) against Eucalyptus to provide more clarification for EUCA-6560, the following error was seen:
{code}
Client.403 Forbidden: Login Failure: all modules ignored
{code}

*Signs*

After setting cloud.euca_log_level to EXTREME, the following was seen in the cloud-extreme.log file:
{code}

HTTPHTTP/1.1 POST /services/Eucalyptus/
Connection: Keep-Alive
Content-Length: 234
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=utf-8
Host: 10.104.1.216:8773
User-Agent: ec2-api-tools 1.6.10.1
============================================

mp=2013-10-05T21%3A11%3A23.287Z&Owner.1=self
============================================

*Actions*

* Installed latest version of [AWS EC2 API Tools|http://aws.amazon.com/developertools/351]
* Used ec2-describe-images using EC2_URL, access-key and secret-access-key of the admin user in the eucalyptus account on a Eucalyptus 3.3.1 cloud

*Pertinent Data*

This was found while trying to compare ec2-describe-images for instance-backed and EBS-backed images.

*Workaround*

N/A
fields.summary: EC2 API Tools (1.6.10.1) Do Not Work With Eucalyptus 3.3.1
fields.environment:
*non-HA*

{code}

comments.body:
Works for me when the service path ends with "/" (against testing branch):

{code}
$ export EC2_URL=http://10.111.1.42:8773/services/Eucalyptus
$ ./bin/ec2-describe-images
Client.403 Forbidden: Login Failure: all modules ignored
$ export EC2_URL=http://10.111.1.42:8773/services/Eucalyptus/
$ ./bin/ec2-describe-images
IMAGE	eri-D2913A0B	418969187789/initrd.img-3.2.0-23-virtual	418969187789	available	private		i386	ramdisk		instance-store		
IMAGE	emi-92A63910	418969187789/precise-server-cloudimg-amd64-ext3.img	418969187789	available	public		i386	machine	eki-0B123B29	eri-D2913A0B		instance-store	paravirtualized	
IMAGE	eki-0B123B29	418969187789/vmlinuz-3.2.0-23-virtual	418969187789	available	private		i386	kernel			instance-store		
{code}
bug reported against an non-supported version of euca.
